verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Now when Jacob כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> that there was שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> Jacob לְבָנָ֔יו <WH1121> unto his sons לָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Why תִּתְרָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> Why do ye look

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> Behold I have heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> that there is שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt רְדוּ־ <WH3381> get you down שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there וְשִׁבְרוּ־ <WH7666> thither and buy לָ֣נוּ מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> place וְנִחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> for us from thence that we may live וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not נָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> and not die
וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <WH3381> went down אֲחֵֽי־ <WH251> brethren יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph's עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> ten לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <WH7666> to buy בָּ֖ר <WH1250> corn מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> in Egypt

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְיָמִין֙ <WH1144> But Benjamin אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph's לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob אֶת־ <WH854> with אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> not with his brethren כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> for he said פֶּן־ <WH6435> Lest peradventure יִקְרָאֶ֖נּוּ <WH7122> befall him אָסֽוֹן׃ <WH611> mischief

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִשְׁבֹּ֖ר <WH7666> to buy בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> [corn] among הַבָּאִ֑ים <WH935> those that came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> for the famine בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> was in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וְיוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> And Joseph ה֚וּא <WH1931> he הַשַּׁלִּ֣יט <WH7989> [was] the governor עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> over the land ה֥וּא <WH1931> who הַמַּשְׁבִּ֖יר <WH7666> [and] he [it was] that sold לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all עַ֣ם <WH5971> to all the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came אֲחֵ֣י <WH251> brethren יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> and Joseph's וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <WH7812> and bowed down ל֥וֹ אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> themselves before him [with] their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the earth

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> his brethren וַיַּכִּרֵ֑ם <WH5234> and he knew וַיִּתְנַכֵּ֨ר <WH5234> them but made himself strange אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> unto them and spake אִתָּ֣ם <WH854> to them קָשׁ֗וֹת <WH7186> roughly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> unto them and he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> unto them Whence בָּאתֶ֔ם <WH935> come וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> ye? And they said מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> From the land כְּנַ֖עַן <WH3667> of Canaan לִשְׁבָּר־ <WH7666> to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> food
וַיַּכֵּ֥ר <WH5234> knew יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> his brethren וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הִכִּרֻֽהוּ׃ <WH5234> but they knew

וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <WH2142> remembered יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַחֲלֹמ֔וֹת <WH2472> the dreams אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָלַ֖ם <WH2492> which he dreamed לָהֶ֑ם וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> of them and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to מְרַגְּלִ֣ים <WH7270> unto them Ye [are] spies אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you לִרְא֛וֹת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land בָּאתֶֽם׃ <WH935> ye are come

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him לֹ֣א <WH3808> No אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> unto him Nay my lord וַעֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <WH5650> are thy servants בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> come לִשְׁבָּר־ <WH7666> but to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> food

כֻּלָּ֕נוּ <WH3605> are all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons אִישׁ־ <WH376> man's אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> [are] all one נָ֑חְנוּ <WH5168> We כֵּנִ֣ים <WH3651> we [are] true אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> [men] thy servants מְרַגְּלִֽים׃ <WH7270> are no spies

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to לֹ֕א <WH3808> No כִּֽי־ <WH3588> at עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land בָּאתֶ֥ם <WH935> ye are come לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> unto them Nay but to see

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they said שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂר֩ <WH6240> ten עֲבָדֶ֨יךָ <WH5650> Thy servants אַחִ֧ים ׀ <WH251> brethren אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> of one בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הַקָּטֹ֤ן <WH6996> and behold the youngest אֶת־ <WH854> is with אָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> with our father הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> [is] this day וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> is no

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> about יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> And Joseph ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to them דִּבַּ֧רְתִּי <WH1696> unto them That [is it] that I spake אֲלֵכֶ֛ם <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> unto you saying מְרַגְּלִ֥ים <WH7270> Ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> you

בְּזֹ֖את <WH2063> Hereby תִּבָּחֵ֑נוּ <WH974> ye shall be proved חֵ֤י <WH2416> By the life פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh אִם־ <WH518> shall not תֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> ye shall not go forth מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּב֛וֹא <WH935> come אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> hence except your youngest הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> here

שִׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> Send מִכֶּ֣ם <WH4480> at אֶחָד֮ <WH259> one וְיִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> of you and let him fetch אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶם֒ <WH251> your brother וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you הֵאָ֣סְר֔וּ <WH631> and ye shall be kept in prison וְיִבָּֽחֲנוּ֙ <WH974> may be proved דִּבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1697> that your words הַֽאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> whether [there be any] truth אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> in וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֕א <WH3808> you or else חֵ֣י <WH2416> by the life פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh כִּ֥י <WH3588> surely מְרַגְּלִ֖ים <WH7270> surely ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> he
וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> And he put them all together אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> in מִשְׁמָ֖ר <WH4929> into ward שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֤ם <WH413> about יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> unto them the third זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise עֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> This do וִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> and live אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יָרֵֽא׃ <WH3372> fear

אִם־ <WH518> if כֵּנִ֣ים <WH3651> If ye [be] true אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <WH251> of your brethren אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> [men] let one יֵאָסֵ֖ר <WH631> be bound בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house מִשְׁמַרְכֶ֑ם <WH4929> of your prison וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> go הָבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> ye carry שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> corn רַעֲב֥וֹן <WH7459> for the famine בָּתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <WH1004> of your houses

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶ֤ם <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> your youngest תָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> But bring אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְיֵאָמְנ֥וּ <WH539> be verified דִבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1697> unto me so shall your words וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and you will not תָמ֑וּתוּ <WH4191> and ye shall not die וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> And they did כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִ֗יו <WH251> to another אֲבָל֮ <WH61> We [are] verily אֲשֵׁמִ֣ים ׀ <WH818> guilty אֲנַחְנוּ֮ <WH587> we עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אָחִינוּ֒ <WH251> concerning our brother אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> in that רָאִ֜ינוּ <WH7200> we saw צָרַ֥ת <WH6869> the anguish נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> of his soul בְּהִתְחַֽנְנ֥וֹ <WH2603> when he besought אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמָ֑עְנוּ <WH8085> us and we would not hear עַל־ <WH5921> concerning כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that בָּ֣אָה <WH935> come אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> about הַצָּרָ֖ה <WH6869> therefore is this distress הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> answered רְאוּבֵ֨ן <WH7205> And Reuben אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> them saying הֲלוֹא֩ <WH3808> not אָמַ֨רְתִּי <WH559> Spake I אֲלֵיכֶ֧ם ׀ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֛ר <WH559> not unto you saying אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּחֶטְא֥וּ <WH2398> Do not sin בַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> against the child וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> and ye would not hear וְגַם־ <WH1571> for דָּמ֖וֹ <WH1818> ? therefore behold also his blood הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold נִדְרָֽשׁ׃ <WH1875> is required

וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> like לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> And they knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> understood יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> not that Joseph כִּ֥י <WH3588> by הַמֵּלִ֖יץ <WH3887> [them] for he spake unto them by an interpreter בֵּינֹתָֽם׃ <WH996> between

וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> And he turned himself about מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ <WH1058> from them and wept וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> and returned to them again אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and communed אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> with them and took מֵֽאִתָּם֙ <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> from them Simeon וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ר <WH631> and bound אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> him before their eyes

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> Then Joseph וַיְמַלְא֣וּ <WH4390> to fill אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלֵיהֶם֮ <WH3627> their sacks בָּר֒ <WH1250> with corn וּלְהָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> and to restore כַּסְפֵּיהֶם֙ <WH3701> money אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man's אֶל־ <WH413> in שַׂקּ֔וֹ <WH8242> into his sack וְלָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> and to give לָהֶ֛ם צֵדָ֖ה <WH6720> them provision לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> for the way וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did he לָהֶ֖ם כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> and thus
וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> And they laded אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁבְרָ֖ם <WH7668> with the corn עַל־ <WH5921> and חֲמֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH2543> their asses וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and departed מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> of them opened הָאֶחָ֜ד <WH259> And as one אֶת־ <WH853> שַׂקּ֗וֹ <WH8242> his sack לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give מִסְפּ֛וֹא <WH4554> provender לַחֲמֹר֖וֹ <WH2543> his ass בַּמָּל֑וֹן <WH4411> in the inn וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> he espied אֶת־ <WH853> כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <WH3701> his money וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּפִ֥י <WH6310> mouth אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH572> for behold it [was] in his sack's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> unto his brethren הוּשַׁ֣ב <WH7725> is restored כַּסְפִּ֔י <WH3701> My money וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> is even הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and lo בְאַמְתַּחְתִּ֑י <WH572> [it is] even in my sack וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> failed לִבָּ֗ם <WH3820> and their heart וַיֶּֽחֶרְד֞וּ <WH2729> [them] and they were afraid אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִיו֙ <WH251> to another לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> hath done אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> What [is] this [that] God לָֽנוּ׃

וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> And they came אֶל־ <WH413> about יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> unto Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> their father אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> unto the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and told ל֔וֹ אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקֹּרֹ֥ת <WH7136> him all that befell אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto them saying

דִּ֠בֶּר <WH1696> spake הָאִ֨ישׁ <WH582> another אֲדֹנֵ֥י <WH113> [who is] the lord הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land אִתָּ֖נוּ <WH854> for קָשׁ֑וֹת <WH7186> roughly וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> to us and took אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> כִּֽמְרַגְּלִ֖ים <WH7270> us for spies אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the country

וַנֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And we said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> unto כֵּנִ֣ים <WH3651> unto him We [are] true אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הָיִ֖ינוּ <WH1961> are not מְרַגְּלִֽים׃ <WH7270> [men] we are no spies

שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <WH587> we אַחִ֖ים <WH251> brethren בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אָבִ֑ינוּ <WH1> of our father הָאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> one אֵינֶ֔נּוּ <WH369> is no וְהַקָּטֹ֥ן <WH6996> [is] not and the youngest הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> [is] this day אֶת־ <WH854> is with אָבִ֖ינוּ <WH1> with our father בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <WH413> about הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And the man אֲדֹנֵ֣י <WH113> the lord הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the country בְּזֹ֣את <WH2063> I אֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> unto us Hereby shall I know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that כֵנִ֖ים <WH3651> that ye [are] true אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you אֲחִיכֶ֤ם <WH251> of your brethren הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> one הַנִּ֣יחוּ <WH3240> [men] leave אִתִּ֔י <WH854> for וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַעֲב֥וֹן <WH7459> [food for] the famine בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם <WH1004> of your households קְח֥וּ <WH3947> [here] with me and take וָלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> and go

וְ֠הָבִיאוּ <WH935> And bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹן֮ <WH6996> your youngest אֵלַי֒ <WH413> to me וְאֵֽדְעָ֗ה <WH3045> unto me then shall I know כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> you are not מְרַגְּלִים֙ <WH7270> that ye [are] no spies אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כֵנִ֖ים <WH3651> but [that] ye [are] true אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶם֙ <WH251> you your brother אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> [men so] will I deliver לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land תִּסְחָֽרוּ׃ <WH5503> and ye shall traffick

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came הֵ֚ם <WH1992> as they מְרִיקִ֣ים <WH7324> And it came to pass as they emptied שַׂקֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH8242> their sacks וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> that behold every man's צְרוֹר־ <WH6872> bundle כַּסְפּ֖וֹ <WH3701> of money בְּשַׂקּ֑וֹ <WH8242> [was] in his sack וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> saw אֶת־ <WH853> צְרֹר֧וֹת <WH6872> the bundles כַּסְפֵּיהֶ֛ם <WH3701> of money הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they וַאֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> and when [both] they and their father וַיִּירָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> they were afraid

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> And Reuben אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֣יו <WH1> unto his father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> my two בָנַי֙ <WH1121> sons תָּמִ֔ית <WH4191> Slay אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֲבִיאֶ֖נּוּ <WH935> if I bring אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you תְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> him not to thee deliver אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> in יָדִ֔י <WH3027> him into my hand וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> and I אֲשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <WH7725> and I will bring him to thee again אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> shall not go down בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> My son עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָחִ֨יו <WH251> with you for his brother מֵ֜ת <WH4191> is dead וְה֧וּא <WH1931> and he לְבַדּ֣וֹ <WH905> alone נִשְׁאָ֗ר <WH7604> and he is left וּקְרָאָ֤הוּ <WH7122> befall אָסוֹן֙ <WH611> alone if mischief בַּדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> him by the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> are taking בָ֔הּ וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֧ם <WH3381> then shall ye bring down אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׂיבָתִ֛י <WH7872> my gray hairs בְּיָג֖וֹן <WH3015> with sorrow שְׁאֽוֹלָה׃ <WH7585> to the grave
